software_development.description: Software development involves designing, coding, testing, and maintaining computer programs and applications. It's a field that combines creativity with logical problem-solving.

data_science.description: Data Science combines statistics, mathematics, and programming to extract insights and knowledge from data. Data scientists analyze complex datasets to solve problems and inform decision-making.

graphic_design.description: Graphic designers create visual content to communicate messages. They design layouts, create visual elements, and work on branding to effectively convey ideas through visual media.

marketing.description: Marketing professionals promote products, services, and brands to potential customers. They develop strategies to increase awareness, engagement, and sales through various channels.

healthcare.description: Healthcare professionals provide medical services to individuals to maintain or improve their health. This field encompasses a wide range of roles from direct patient care to research and administration.

finance.description: Finance professionals manage money, investments, and financial systems. They analyze financial data, create reports, and develop strategies to optimize financial performance.

education.description: Education professionals facilitate learning and development in various settings. They design curriculum, deliver instruction, and assess student progress to promote knowledge acquisition and skill development.
education: Higher education degree for college-level teaching

engineering.description: Engineers design, develop, and test solutions to technical problems. They apply scientific and mathematical principles to create products, systems, and structures that meet human needs.
